title: Blaming Mike Pettine's PAT decision is also missing the point -- Bud Shaw's Sports Spin
text:
Published By: Cleveland.com: Sports - Today 
Mike Pettine decided against kicking an extra point in the fourth quarter. But pinning an overtime loss to Denver on that decision is too ea... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
